listitem.para: Deletes (closes) the listbox whose name is name.

programlisting.userinput: WINDOWCREATE "main "mywindow "mytitle 0 0 100 100 [] LISTBOXCREATE "mywindow "mylist 25 25 50 50 LISTBOXADDSTRING "mylist [Triangle] LISTBOXADDSTRING "mylist [Square] LISTBOXDELETE "mylist WINDOWDELETE "mywindow
